soft_skills.details: Translated complex technical requirements into actionable project milestones for non-technical stakeholders.
Identified a recurring database latency issue and implemented a caching strategy that improved load times by 40%.
Successfully led a technology shift from Odoo to Angular/Django in 14 days, resulting in the on-time delivery of a bespoke dashboard for a high-profile client while meeting complex business needs.
Actively participated in Agile ceremonies (Daily Stand-ups, Sprint Planning, Retrospectives), fostering transparent communication and effectively reducing bottlenecks within the squad.
